bs-socialcomments-type:
Label for option "comment" in entry field "type"
{{Identical|Comment}}
bs-socialcomments-commenttext:
Comments text. Use PLURAL.
$1 is the number of comments
bs-socialcomments-header-create: Header for a comment entry, that is not yet existing{{Identical|Comment}}
bs-socialcomments-header:
Headline for a "comment" entry. should link to the owners user page [[User:$1|User:$1]] and the source page of the entry [[$6|$6]] this comment was made on
* $1 - Username of the owner of this entry
* $2 - Real name of the owner of this entry
* $3 - Main part of title of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $4 - Namespace number of the page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $5 - Namespace name of the page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $6 - Full text of the entries source page, the comment was made on.
* $7 - Header of the entry, the comment was made on
echo-category-title-bs-social-comment-ca: Checkbox label for mail and wiki notification subscription for comments on entities user watches
bs-social-notifications-comment-create: Short message when new comment is created. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
bs-social-notifications-email-comment-cr: Email subject when new comment is created. $1 - username, $2 - user realname

Email body message when new comment is created.
* $1 - username
* $2 - user's real name
* $3 - original post owner's real name
* $4 - Text of the comment
bs-social-notifications-web-comment-crea: Web message when comment is created. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - original post owner realname
bs-social-notifications-comment-edit: Short message when comment is edited. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
bs-social-notifications-email-comment-ed: Email subject when comment is edited. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
Email body message when comment is edited. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - original post owner realname, $4 - Text of the comment
bs-social-notifications-web-comment-edit: Web message when comment is edited. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - original post owner realname
bs-social-notifications-comment-delete: Short message when comment is deleted. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
bs-social-notifications-email-comment-de: Email subject when comment is deleted. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
Email body message when comment is deleted. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - original post owner realname
bs-social-notifications-web-comment-dele: Web message when comment is deleted. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - original post owner realname
bs-social-notifications-comment-owner-cr: Short message to the owner of the post when new comment is created. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
bs-social-notifications-email-comment-ow: Email subject to the owner of the post when new comment is created. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
Email body to the owner of the post message when new comment is created. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - text of the comment
bs-social-notifications-web-comment-owne: Web message to the owner of the post when comment is created. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
bs-social-notifications-comment-owner-ed: Short message to the owner of the post when comment is edited. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
bs-social-notifications-email-comment-ow: Email subject to the owner of the post when comment is edited. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
Email body to the owner of the post message when comment is edited. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - text of the comment
bs-social-notifications-web-comment-owne: Web message to the owner of the post when comment is edited. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
bs-social-notifications-comment-owner-de: Short message to the owner of the post when comment is deleted. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
bs-social-notifications-email-comment-ow: Email subject to the owner of the post when comment is deleted. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
Email body to the owner of the post message when comment is deleted. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
bs-social-notifications-web-comment-owne: Web message to the owner of the post when comment is deleted. $1 - username, $2 - user realname
bs-social-notifications-comment-owner-ed: Bundle message  to the owner of the post when same entity was edited multiple times. $1 - number of edits
bs-social-notification-comment-primary-l: Label for the email primary link button
bs-social-notification-comment-parentown: Label for secondary link, leads to userpage of post owner. $1 - Post owner realname
bs-social-notification-comment-parentent: Label for secondary link, leads to the post page where comment is added
bs-social-comment-event-create: Notification message when somebody makes a comment
bs-social-comment-event-own-create:
Notification message when somebody makes a comment on a post created by the user receiving the notification
$1 - agent,
$2 - page anchor
bs-social-comment-event-edit:
Notification message when somebody edits a comment
$1 - agent,
$2 - page anchor
bs-social-comment-event-own-edit:
Notification message when somebody edits a comment on a post created by the user receiving the notification
$1 - agent,
$2 - page anchor
bs-social-comment-event-delete:
Notification message when somebody deletes a comment
$1 - agent,
$2 - page anchor
bs-social-comment-event-own-delete:
Notification message when somebody deletes a comment on a post created by the user receiving the notification
$1 - agent,
$2 - page anchor
bs-social-comment-for-user-event-create:
Notification message when somebody creates a comment on user's page
$1 - agent,
$2 - page anchor
bs-social-comment-for-user-event-edit:
Notification message when somebody edits a comment on user's page
$1 - agent,
$2 - page anchor
bs-social-comment-for-user-event-delete:
Notification message when somebody deletes a comment on user's page
$1 - agent,
$2 - page anchor
